text: 23.2 Mat 17.27, Luk 20.25, Jon 19.12, Apo 17.7 Dad amɨl, takaw okok nɨb okok nɨb dad apɨl agɨlak, Chɨn ke pɨyowɨl nɨŋɨd nopun, bɨ anɨb ak binɨb chɨnop okok takaw yepɨs agup agɨlak. Agup, Gapman bɨnonɨm nop takis ma ñɨnɨmɨb agup agɨlak. Pen takaw olap agup agɨlak. Agup, Yad ke Juda bɨnonɨm ak mɨdɨl, God yɨp aglup agup agɨlak.
